programme.title: The Top 10 Red Bull F1 Drivers - Part 1
programme.desc: Red Bull is much younger than Formula 1’s other big teams, having arrived in 2005. But in less than two decades it has racked up some impressive achievements. Six drivers’ and five constructors’ titles headline a CV that includes 92 world championship grand prix wins, enough for sixth on the all-time list behind Ferrari, McLaren, Mercedes, Williams and Lotus. For this list of top 10 F1 drivers, we’ve taken into account the amount of success the racers scored with Red Bull and its sister team Toro Rosso/AlphaTauri, the impact they had and the circumstances of their time within the Red Bull fold. Want to know more about our top 10 or hear experts debate the list? Take a look here: ...

programme.title: The Top 10 Red Bull F1 Drivers - Part 2
programme.desc: Red Bull is much younger than Formula 1’s other big teams, having arrived in 2005. But in less than two decades it has racked up some impressive achievements. Six drivers’ and five constructors’ titles headline a CV that includes 92 world championship grand prix wins, enough for sixth on the all-time list behind Ferrari, McLaren, Mercedes, Williams and Lotus. For this list of top 10 F1 drivers, we’ve taken into account the amount of success the racers scored with Red Bull and its sister team Toro Rosso/AlphaTauri, the impact they had and the circumstances of their time within the Red Bull fold. Want to know more about our top 10 or hear experts debate the list? Take a look here: ...

programme.title: 4 Things We'd Change To Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya | Formula 1
programme.desc: How do you fix the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya? Was the new Turn 10 any better? And is it a completely boring circuit? Spanish GP races are usually a snoozefest, and despite Mercedes' exciting strategic win, the 2021 GP wasn't much better. But why is that? Jake Boxall-Legge has 4 ways the circuit could improve, whether the new Turn 10 saved the day, and how Formula 1 drivers could benefit from circuit upgrades.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasn't actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapman's complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: 8 F1 drivers who only started one grand prix
programme.desc: Drivers only making one Formula 1 start in their career are a rare breed, and quite often those who appear just once have an interesting story behind their fleeting presence on the F1 grid. Jake Boxall-Legge takes a look back through history to pick out eight varied stories about one-time F1 starters - some you may remember better than others. And we finish off our trip down memory lane paying our respects to a man who only made this list because tragedy intervened...

programme.title: Climbing Up The Grid with Ayao Komatsu, Haas F1 Team Principal
programme.desc: Becoming Team Principal for Haas' F1 team this year, Ayao Komatsu came from an engineering background, a rather unusual route for a Team Principal but one that he believes gives him an important perspective while pushing Haas towards the front of the grid. Stuart Codling got together with Ayao Komatsu at his favourite rock climbing centre (yes, we mean rock climbing) Big Rock Climbing in Milton Keynes to chat about his career, why rock climbing is so important to him, and how he's leading Haas in climbing up the F1 grid.

programme.desc: Watch the first race of the third round of the 2025 Castrol Toyota Formula Regional Championship season at Manfeild Circuit Chris Amon, New Zealand.

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 4: Rallye De Wallonie
programme.desc: What a denouement. After Cédric Cherain dominated the race with the Porsche 992 Rally GT, the car suddenly stopped briefly on the Naninne dirt track due to an electronic fault. lost 2 minutes and Jos Verstappen did not miss the opportunity to score his third win of the season.

programme.title: Piastri & Norris - Should McLaren "let them race" as F1 2025 heats up?
programme.desc: Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri are currently both looking strong, leading the 2025 drivers and constructors standings - but that begs the question: what should McLaren do when their drivers are taking points off of each other, with Max Verstappen nipping at both their heels? Should McLaren enforce team orders, or are Papaya Rules still the best way to go? We go over the main arguments on the topic to analyse what McLaren's best chances are for winning both the F1 Drivers and Constructors Championships are in 2025.

programme.title: W2RC 2024: Full Season Review
programme.desc: Let's look back at the 2024 season.

programme.title: Round 3: Dubai Autodrome - Race 1
programme.desc: Watch the live broadcast of the 2024/2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Middle East round 3 first race at Dubai Autodrome.

programme.title: The Top 10 Red Bull F1 Drivers - Part 1
programme.desc: Red Bull is much younger than Formula 1’s other big teams, having arrived in 2005. But in less than two decades it has racked up some impressive achievements. Six drivers’ and five constructors’ titles headline a CV that includes 92 world championship grand prix wins, enough for sixth on the all-time list behind Ferrari, McLaren, Mercedes, Williams and Lotus. For this list of top 10 F1 drivers, we’ve taken into account the amount of success the racers scored with Red Bull and its sister team Toro Rosso/AlphaTauri, the impact they had and the circumstances of their time within the Red Bull fold. Want to know more about our top 10 or hear experts debate the list? Take a look here: ...

programme.title: The Top 10 Red Bull F1 Drivers - Part 2
programme.desc: Red Bull is much younger than Formula 1’s other big teams, having arrived in 2005. But in less than two decades it has racked up some impressive achievements. Six drivers’ and five constructors’ titles headline a CV that includes 92 world championship grand prix wins, enough for sixth on the all-time list behind Ferrari, McLaren, Mercedes, Williams and Lotus. For this list of top 10 F1 drivers, we’ve taken into account the amount of success the racers scored with Red Bull and its sister team Toro Rosso/AlphaTauri, the impact they had and the circumstances of their time within the Red Bull fold. Want to know more about our top 10 or hear experts debate the list? Take a look here: ...

programme.title: 4 Things We'd Change To Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya | Formula 1
programme.desc: How do you fix the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya? Was the new Turn 10 any better? And is it a completely boring circuit? Spanish GP races are usually a snoozefest, and despite Mercedes' exciting strategic win, the 2021 GP wasn't much better. But why is that? Jake Boxall-Legge has 4 ways the circuit could improve, whether the new Turn 10 saved the day, and how Formula 1 drivers could benefit from circuit upgrades.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasn't actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapman's complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: 8 F1 drivers who only started one grand prix
programme.desc: Drivers only making one Formula 1 start in their career are a rare breed, and quite often those who appear just once have an interesting story behind their fleeting presence on the F1 grid. Jake Boxall-Legge takes a look back through history to pick out eight varied stories about one-time F1 starters - some you may remember better than others. And we finish off our trip down memory lane paying our respects to a man who only made this list because tragedy intervened...

programme.title: Climbing Up The Grid with Ayao Komatsu, Haas F1 Team Principal
programme.desc: Becoming Team Principal for Haas' F1 team this year, Ayao Komatsu came from an engineering background, a rather unusual route for a Team Principal but one that he believes gives him an important perspective while pushing Haas towards the front of the grid. Stuart Codling got together with Ayao Komatsu at his favourite rock climbing centre (yes, we mean rock climbing) Big Rock Climbing in Milton Keynes to chat about his career, why rock climbing is so important to him, and how he's leading Haas in climbing up the F1 grid.

programme.title: Episode 3: Monster Jam and UIM XCAT World Championship
programme.desc: In this episode, cutting-edge technology and unparalleled skill combine to create a pulse-pounding race of innovation and adrenaline. Buckle up, rev your engines, and get ready for some electrifying action as you experience the thrill of full G-force! The episode kicks off with the high-octane action of Monster Jam in Qatar! With significant investments in local championships and state-of-the-art facilities, Qatar is on a mission to empower the next generation of drivers and bring world-class events, like the WEC, to the Middle East. Meet Classroom Crusher, the newest Monster Jam truck that’s too cool for school and ready to break all the rules. Next, we head to Fujairah, the "home"...

programme.title: What it Takes to be an F1 World Champion - Exclusive Interview with Damon Hill
programme.desc: Joining James Allen on the podcast this week is Damon Hill, 1996 F1 World Champion and broadcaster, whilst he trains for his Neuro UK Fundraiser, cycling the 2024 L'Etape du Tour event in France. The pair discuss everything from the upcoming 2024 Silverstone Grand Prix, what it's like for British drivers to win their home race, engaging with F1's fanbase and what it takes to become an F1 World Champion. Please check out the links below if you'd like to read more or donate to Damon's cycling fundraiser: www.justgiving.com/page/damon-hill-1718188619747 www.justgiving.com/campaign/neuro-uk-2023 0:00 Neuro UK and Damon's Fundraiser 2:55 Damon's Feeling Pre-Fundraiser 5:06 Alain Prost...

programme.title: Round 3: Manfeild Circuit Chris Amon - Race 2
programme.desc: Watch the second race of the third round of the 2025 Castrol Toyota Formula Regional Championship season at Manfeild Circuit Chris Amon, New Zealand.

programme.title: 2 + 4 = 24 documentary
programme.desc: 1 Rider. 1 Driver. 2 Races - each over 24 hours. 24 hours are always tough, no matter where you do it. Australian bike rider Josh Hook on Honda Fireblade and Portuguese racing driver Tiago Monteiro on Honda Civic Type R walk us through the challenging endurance races in detail and answer the question: what is it like to be a 2-wheel and 4-wheel race gladiator? Follow Josh Hook and Tiago Monteiro to the edges of hell and back in the two toughest 24 Hour races of 2020: 24 Hours of Nurburgring and 24 Heures Motos at Le Mans.

programme.title: Chantilly Arts & Elegance Richard Mille 2024
programme.desc: While Chantilly Arts & Elegance Richard Mille's focus on elegance has remained unchanged, the Competition has undergone a complete overhaul, offering manufacturers of premium brands a new, private setting to welcome their guests over three days. The 2024 edition was an exceptional success, with record attendance and increased participation from the major car brands. The event won acclaim for both the quality of the cars on display and the exclusive experience offered to guests, consolidating its position as one of the must-attend events for elegance and prestige motoring.

programme.title: Why the 'second' Niki Lauda was even better than the first
programme.desc: As the Formula 1 paddock sets up in Monaco, the late Niki Lauda is not far from anyone's thoughts following his death earlier this week. Inside the paddock, Edd Straw is joined by Giorgio Piola, who knew Lauda throughout his F1 career, to get a very personal account of what it was like to know the three-time world champion. Piola explains what made Lauda tick, and how his accident in 1976 changed him into a new person who was "even more wonderful than the first".

programme.title: 9 interesting F1 tests that didn’t lead to anything
programme.desc: Formula 1 testing has thrown up some interesting car and driver combinations over the years, and as this list shows, plenty of top-name drivers have turned up in unexpected places. But sometimes a test deal catches the eye then doesn’t lead to a more permanent arrangement, for a wide variety of reasons. Here we take a look at nine particularly high-profile drivers who had a brief try-out with a team, but didn’t end up signing a proper deal

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: The history of driver bans in Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 drivers very rarely get banned from races - in fact, just five times in the history of the world championship has a driver sat out a race due to an official FIA sanction. But, unsurprisingly, F1's history of bans is a bit more complicated than that, so in this video we also look at the other drivers who have served what could be termed as 'unofficial' bans over the course of F1 history.

programme.title: Episode 2: KTM 890 Adventure R
programme.desc: Sam checks out the new KTM 890 Adventure R and asks if its really worth upgrading from the 790. programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: Leclerc Looks Back at Highlights from his F1 Career
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc has had some huge moments in his career, from spectacular wins to helping the team develop even before he raced for Ferrari's F1 team. We sat down with Leclerc and brought him 5 photos from his career, asking him to pinpoint where he was and why each photo is so special to him.

programme.title: Tour Auto 2025
programme.desc: The Tour Auto 2025 came to an end after five days of emotion, performance and conviviality on France’s most beautiful roads. From Paris to Nice, this 34th edition brought together over 240 historic vehicles, offering a unique spectacle mixing motor sport, heritage and tradition. Setting off from the Château de Vaux-le-Vicomte in Paris on Tuesday April 8, the participants crossed exceptional landscapes and competed in timed events on circuits and closed roads. Thousands of spectators flocked to each stage, confirming the continuing enthusiasm for the event and its automotive heritage. From Paris to Nice, via Alsace and the Massif Central, each circuit and stopover town gave the...

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society. 0:00 A2RL - Autonomous Racing 1:00 What is A2RL and Why it's Different 3:05 The Challenge's Format 3:38 The Future of A2RL Beyond 2024 5:23 Interest from the World of Motorsport 6:44 The Tech Powering the Cars 7:44 How the Cars Drive...

programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.title: Race Rewind: 2025 Coca-Cola 600
programme.desc: Four stages, 600 miles and a late winning pass by Ross Chastain. See why the Coke 600 shines yet again as a crown-jewel event.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 2
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Bouldern & Climbing 2013
programme.desc: Highball bouldering in Switzerland’s Ticino and the redpoint ascent of the “Rote Wand” in /VorarlbergAustria. Beside adrenaline packed action this is also a story of trust and friendship as well as responsibility for yourself.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsportsteam 2015 - Mountainsports: Climbing & Unicycling
programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Bürser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 startet im Januar in ihre 16. Saison - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Stopp der Tour findet in Baqueira Beret statt.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren zweiten Stopp in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt! Damit kehrt die FWT in das Freeride-Mekka der Pyrenäen zurück.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tägiges Rennen (UCI Hors Catégorie), das in Castellón, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 1, Martinique
programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 2, Germany FIBO Power
programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 3, Serbia
programme.desc: The third episode is hosted in Serbia where world records are broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: The fourth episode takes place in Finland with events such as Bus Pull and the forward hold

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 5, Holland
programme.desc: The next stage of the SCL takes place in Holland with events such as the Atlas Stones and Truck Pull being witnessed

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: The SCL is in full swing and the sixth stage takes place in Latvia where the men are eager to break a national record held here

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal
programme.desc: The competition continues in Portugal with 6 events and thousands of spectators

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 8, Croatia
programme.desc: Episode 8 takes place in 36 degree heat in Croatia and sees the return of Krzysztof Radzikowski after a 2 month absence due to injury

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jürjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Glory 09: New York was a kickboxing event held on June 22, 2013 at the Hammerstein Ballroom in New York City, New York. This event featured a Glory 95kg Slam Tournament.

programme.desc: New Middleweight Champion Alex Pereira puts his title on the line against Yousri Belgaroui. Also, former champion Nieky Holzken returns to face Alim Nabiyev and D’Angelo Marshall meets Ismael Londt in a heavyweight showdown.

programme.desc: Lightweight contender tournament semifinals and finals are featured for GLORY 49, Rotterdam

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 07: Milan at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy April 20, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Giorgio Petrosyan and Hafid El Boustati as headliner. In co-main event, Murthel Groenhart had to battle with fellow superstar Robin van Roosmalen, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Brazilian GLORY middleweight champion Alex ‘Po Atan’ Pereira (31-6, 20 KO’s) headlines the GLORY 74 ARNHEM section of the card, putting his title on the line against Ertugul Bayrak (18-6, 5 KO’s) in a main event fight set for five rounds.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: COLLISION 2 is headlined by GLORY world heavyweight champion Rico ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Verhoeven (55-10, 16 KO’s) and his arch-rival Badr Hari (106-13,92 KO’s), rematching three years on from their first epic encounter.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: 6 Champions, 3 Title Fights, 1 Special Night. The main event features a four man heavyweight tournament including Glory heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven, as well as Hesdy Gerges, Levi Rigters and Tarik Khbabez.

Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Ken Sumner as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: A brave officer Arjun is shattered when his beloved dies in a terrorist attack and he's left paralysed. However, Arjun is chosen as the test case for a new AI-led technology that can turn him into a super soldier. Just then, a terrorist crisis erupts. Arjun rises to the occasion, but can he avert the disaster?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E40 Jodha Akbar S2 E40
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Wielki Skarb
programme.desc: Ślepy mężczyzna chce ukraść złoto samozwańczego gubernatora stanu Chihuahua. Nie może tego zrobić sam, więc najmuje do tego zadania czterech oszustów.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: Na celowniku
programme.desc: Ostatni z serii napadów na dyliżanse na terytorium Arizony dokonuje się na dyliżans, w którym pasażerami są Mike Ryan, tajny agent linii dyliżansowej i Molly Jones, córka miejscowego szeryfa. Bandana maskująca jednego z rabusiów zsuwa się; przywódcę gangu Velvet Clark musi go zabić. Ten ostatni podszywa się pod szanowanego obywatela społeczności i pianistę. Mieszkańcy miasteczka są na tyle wzburzeni ciągłymi napadami, że proszą szeryfa Toma Jonesa o rezygnację, ale zgadzają się dać mu więcej czasu, gdy przyjmuje Ryana jako zastępcę. Poszlaki prowadzą szeryfa do Clarka, ale ten zabija go i ucieka. Ryan tropi go w Gunsight Ridge, gdzie dochodzi do strzelaniny.

programme.title: Zimny Zabójca
programme.desc: José Desman zabija swojego pracodawcę, pana Salazara, byłego sędziego, który skazał jego ojca na śmierć.

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Tylko Waleczni
programme.desc: Mało lubiany dowódca kawalerii zostaje przez swój oddział niesprawiedliwie obwiniony za śmierć jednego z oficerów. Musi teraz odkupić winy i udowodnić swoim ludźmi, że się mylili.

programme.title: Nagroda Jest Twoja... Człowiek Mój
programme.desc: Grupa zabójców poszukuje rewolwerowca El Puro, by zdobyć 10 000 dolarów nagrody.

programme.title: Dobrze Jest Ufać... Ale Lepiej Strzelać
programme.desc: Napad nie udaje się z powodu śmierci przywódcy bandytów. Trzech rabusiów próbuje uzyskać łup. Wieść się rozchodzi i inni dołączają do walki o gotówkę.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 40, 41, 42
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec z Jalisco
programme.desc: Salvador kocha się w pięknej Marii, niestety jej ojciec nie akceptuje ich związku.

programme.title: Bohaterowie Fortu Worth
programme.desc: Podczas wojny secesyjnej, grupa konfederatów z pomocą Apaczy, próbuje zdobyć fort Unionistów, jednocześnie starając się uzyskać poparcie cesarza Meksyku Maksymiliana.

programme.title: Apaczka
programme.desc: Tommy jest niewinnym oficerem kawalerii, który zakochuje się w pięknej kobiecie Apaczów (Yara Kewa) po uratowaniu jej od paskudnego przemytnika broni o imieniu Honest Jeremy.

programme.title: Buddy jedzie na zachód
programme.desc: „Doktor” i Indianin Girolamo trafiają do wioski na Dzikim Zachodzie, gdzie są świadkami terroru ze strony gangu i skorumpowanego szeryfa, który odkrył złoto pod ziemią. Bohaterowie decydują się pomóc mieszkańcom w walce o sprawiedliwość i pozbycie się przestępców.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango wygrywa w pokera worek złota, gangi El Tigre i Don Pablo atakują go. Podczas leczenia ran, Cjamango zaprzyjaźnia się z meksykańskim chłopcem Manuelem i piękną dziewczyną, Perlą.

programme.title: Django i Sartana na Zachodzie
programme.desc: Gang bezwzględnych banitów pod wodzą szalonego Czarnego Burta Kellera porywa Jessicę Colby i postanawia uciec do Meksyku. Sprytny łowca nagród Django i świątobliwy rewolwerowiec Sartana łączą siły, by uratować biedaczkę z nikczemnych szponów gangu.

programme.title: Egzekucja
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Clips ściga Johna Colera, który oszukał go i zagarnął całe złoto ze wspólnego napadu dla siebie. Clips w końcu dopada swoją ofiarę, ale to nie ten Coler, którego szukał. W rzeczywistości to młodszy brat zbiega, Bill, który pracuje w wędrownym cyrku.

programme.title: Szybkoręki
programme.desc: Gang byłych konfederatów oblega fort kawalerii.

programme.title: Siedem Rewolwerów, Jedna Masakra
programme.desc: Mężczyzna zostaje aresztowany, osądzony i skazany za napad, który w rzeczywistości popełnił ktoś inny.

programme.title: Nieznajomy w Paso Bravo
programme.desc: Drifter powraca do małego miasteczka, by pomścić morderstwo żony i córki.

programme.title: Wybuchowy Joe
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Lola Colt - Twarzą w Twarz z El Diablo
programme.desc: Tancerka z saloonu Lola wraz z innymi tancerkami przybywa do miasteczka Sant'Anna. Miasteczko jest terroryzowane przez El Diablo, banitę, który chce sprzedać okoliczne ziemie przedsiębiorstwu kolejowemu. Wraz z Rodem, młodzieńcem, który się w niej zakochał, Lola pomaga kolonistom w buncie.

programme.title: Biały Apacz
programme.desc: Bandyci napadają na grupę osadników i zabijają wszystkich oprócz ciężarnej kobiety, którą ratują Indianie. Kobieta umiera przy porodzie, ale wódz Biały Niedźwiedź adoptuje chłopca, nadaje mu imię Gorejące Niebo i wychowuje jak własnego syna.

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu
programme.desc: Ważny skok idzie źle, gdy dwaj młodzi mężczyźni stają na drodze meksykańskich bandytów i złego, skorumpowanego biznesmena. Ci będą chcieli odzyskać skradziony łup.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Samotna Siódemka
programme.desc: Rodzina z pogranicza przemierza Stany Zjednoczone pociągiem z wagonami, w nadziei na lepsze życie na Terytorium Oregonu.

programme.title: Ścigany
programme.desc: W małym miasteczku miejscowy szeryf zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i zmuszony do ucieczki.

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Ostatnia Misja
programme.desc: Sławny rewolwerowiec powraca do swojej byłej żony, która chce tylko, aby uratował jej męża szeryfa przed zabiciem przez rewolwerowców chcących uwolnić skazanego więźnia.

programme.title: Śmierć Nie Dba o Czas
programme.desc: Meksykański chłop eksmitowany ze swojej ziemi staje się rozwścieczonym banitą. W końcu zostaje aresztowany i trafia do więzienia.

programme.title: Czterej Zabójcy Sartany
programme.desc: Siedmiu zamaskowanych bandytów porywa młodą Susy, kuzynkę burmistrza Clayton City, Franka Clonny'ego. Frank przyjmuje 15.000 dolarów okupu, którego żądają bandyci i obmyśla plan, który pozwoli mu odzyskać pieniądze i schwytać bandytów.

programme.title: Dni Przemocy
programme.desc: W ostatnich miesiącach wojny secesyjnej brat Joego zostaje niesprawiedliwie zabity przez Clifforda, kapitana armii północnej. Joe postanawia dołączyć do grupy południowców zdeterminowanych, by stawiać opór do końca.

programme.title: Dolary Dla McGregorów
programme.desc: Niejaki Forsythe, łowca głów, używa swojej żony jako przynęty na bandytów. Jeden numer się nie udaje i jego żona ginie. Forsythe wyrusza w pościg za mordercą, ale do pogoni dołącza tajemniczy jeździec...

programme.title: Dolina Zemsty
programme.desc: Synowie barona bydła z Kolorado, jeden biologiczny, a drugi adoptowany, żywią do siebie urazę i walczą o kontrolę nad imperium ojca.

programme.title: A Niebo Będzie Nam Dachem
programme.desc: Dwoje włóczęgów spotyka się i wkrótce stają się towarzyszami podróży. Ale jeden z nich, Tim (Gemma), jest ścigany przez szalonego mordercę i jego bandę rewolwerowców, którzy chcą wyrównać stare porachunki.

programme.title: Utah Blaine
programme.desc: Utah Blaine ratuje od śmierci Joe'go Neal'a. By się odwdzięczyć Joe zatrudnia Utah jako zarządcę swojego rancza. Na początku Utah pomaga tylko jego kolega rewolwerowiec, ale stopniowo zjednuje sobie mieszkańców miasteczka. Kulminacją wydarzeń będzie starcie z Russ'em Nevers'em i jego poplecznikiem Rink'em Witter'em oraz ich bandą złoczyńców.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Kid, Postrach Zachodu
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri jako Kid Terror O'Hara, przywódca grupy dzieci, które w opuszczonym miasteczku Torque, bawią się w kowbojskie życie.

programme.title: Doktor Złote Ręce
programme.desc: Były chirurg Doc McGregor jest teraz karciarzem. Zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i ścigany przez Slade'a, łowcę nagród.

programme.title: Niesłusznie oskarżeni
programme.desc: Trzej kowboje, Wes, Vern i Otis, przypadkowo trafiają do kryjówki bandytów. Gdy grupa mścicieli atakuje chatę, Wes i Vern uciekają, lecz zostają omyłkowo uznani za członków gangu. Ścigani przez prawo, muszą udowodnić swoją niewinność, zanim dopadnie ich niesprawiedliwa kara.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Na Granicy
programme.desc: Agent ATF z Houston współpracuje z prokuratorem okręgowym miasta Meksyk w sprawie handlu ludźmi. W trakcie śledztwa odkrywa rodzinne powiązania z pewnym nikczemnym deweloperem. Teraz musi sprzymierzyć się z obrońcą kryminalisty, by powstrzymać rządy tyranii.

programme.title: Droga ucieczki
programme.desc: Dziesięciu pasażerów autobusu utknęło na złomowisku po tym, jak zostali zepchnięci z drogi przez gang motocyklistów. Aby przetrwać, muszą zaimprowizować broń i znaleźć w sobie odwagę, by bronić się przed zabójcami.

programme.title: Poza prawem
programme.desc: Komandos Royal Marines Jake O'Neil zmaga się z życiem cywilnym. Gdy jego była dziewczyna Jade prosi o pomoc w sprawie śmierci ojca, zgadza się. Szybko wpada w sieć intryg i morderstw.

programme.title: Dzień Prania
programme.desc: W nowoorleańskim całodobowym barze-pralni wybucha dziwaczna bójka pomiędzy bezdomną uliczną artystką, najgorszym w mieście dilerem narkotyków, zdesperowaną piosenkarką i skorumpowanym barmanem.

programme.title: Domek do wynajęcia
programme.desc: Szkocka posiadłość staje się centrum szpiegowskich intryg. Alianci, agenci Nazi i tajemniczy goście rywalizują o wynalazek – niemal doskonały celownik bombowy. Wśród nich ewakuowany chłopiec i zestrzelony pilot RAF-u. Czy ktoś zdradzi? Klasyczna intryga w wersji kolorowej i z polskim lektorem.

programme.title: Astronauta - Ostatnia Próba
programme.desc: Kiedy tragiczny wypadek niweczy pierwszą załogową misję mającą na celu zbadanie życia na księżycach Jowisza, Michael Forrest musi odbyć 3-letnią podróż do domu na Ziemię całkowicie sam.

programme.title: Siostrzeństwo
programme.desc: Cassie cierpi na powracające wizje morderów, z którymi radzi sobie malując brutalne sceny na płótnie.

programme.title: Nie poddawaj się
programme.desc: Co byś zrobił, aby uratować swoje dziecko? Młody nastolatek zmaga się z wyniszczającą chorobą psychiczną, a jego matka ryzykuje wszystko, aby go uratować, starając się nie tracąc przy tym reszty rodziny.

programme.title: Zabawny Derek
programme.desc: Derek staje w obronie swojej komedii, ponieważ nie może zdradzić swoich marzeń.

programme.title: Droga przed nami
programme.desc: W trakcie II wojny światowej grupa brytyjskich poborowych przechodzi transformację od niezdyscyplinowanej drużyny do zgranego zespołu, dzięki sile woli swojego sierżanta i porucznika. W obliczu działań na froncie w Afryce Północnej, odkrywają brutalną rzeczywistość wojny.

programme.title: Sylwetki
programme.desc: Aamod jest emerytowanym dyrektorem wykonawczym i playboyem, który mieszka samotnie w swoim wielkim apartamencie w centrum Chicago; Nadia jest prawniczką, która jedzie właśnie zobaczyć swoich konserwatywnych muzułmańskich rodziców po raz pierwszy od ponad dekady.

programme.title: Ostatnie Posunięcie
programme.desc: Aby uratować życie swojej córki i odzyskać reputację, zhańbiony były detektyw Nick Mathers musi schwytać sadystycznego zabójcę Wielkiego Mistrza, zanim skończy się czas, a ostatnia figura zostanie zabrana w śmiertelnej grze w szachy.

programme.title: Apokalipsa: Dzień Pierwszy
programme.desc: Dwie bratnie dusze zostają uwięzione razem pod koniec III wojny światowej, a ich życia zostają na zawsze splecione.

programme.title: Rzeź Lekarstwem na Wszystko
programme.desc: Vet prowadzi swoją drużynę rozwiązanych najemników do zdradzieckiego Gallows Wood na ostatnią misję, by schwytać nieuchwytnego profesora Blacka.

programme.title: Śmiertelny Weekend
programme.desc: Dwie młode pary przed przeprowadzką do różnych miast wybierają się w ostatnią wspólną wycieczkę pod namiot. Niestety, pewne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, a zazdrość zaczyna zbierać żniwo. Weekend przybiera nieoczekiwany i śmiertelnie niebezpieczny obrót.

programme.title: Zabójcza Ofiara
programme.desc: Niespełna trzy dekady po porwaniu przez psychotycznego pułkownika Hogana, weteran wojny w Wietnamie i elitarny żołnierz Mike Danton po raz kolejny musi stawić czoła swojemu arcywrogowi. Czy Danton jest wciąż najlepszy?

programme.title: Porucznik Albert
programme.desc: W 1944 roku, w niemieckim obozie jenieckim, alianccy więźniowie tworzą atrapę o imieniu Albert, by oszukać strażników. Po kilku nieudanych ucieczkach, porucznik Ainsworth, artysta w cywilu, wymyśla model głowy fikcyjnego więźnia, który pomaga im zmylić strażników i uciec z obozu.

programme.title: Morderstwo Nad Rzeką Wolf
programme.desc: Dwóch najlepszych przyjaciół szuka ucieczki ze świata pełnego niebezpieczeństw.

programme.title: Współczesna historia Kopciuszka
programme.desc: Elle chce zostać piosenkarką i autorką tekstów, ale jej marzenia przerywa nagła śmierć rodziców. Wprowadza się do swojego przybranego wujka, który prowadzi małą niezależną wytwórnię płytową. Jej największy zespół, Sensation, jest również największą bolączką Elle. Środowisko muzyki pop w wytwórni, bardzo różniące się od korzeni country, do których przywykła. To potęguje poczucie straty, frustrację i niesłuszne skądinąd poczucie winy Elle spowodowane faktem, że jej rodzice zginęli w wypadku jadąc na jej występ. Kiedy Ell poznaje Ty Parkera, słynnego piosenkarza pop z pasją do „prawdziwej” muzyki, jej stłumiona ambicja zostaje uwolniona.

programme.title: CainAbel
programme.desc: W każdej rodzinie jest dobro i zło. Pokolenie, które poświęca się, by uchronić swoją rodzinę przed zniszczeniem, może przekląć i skazać na zagładę obecne i przyszłe pokolenia.

programme.title: Szlakiem Skarbów Patagonii
programme.desc: Współczesny western rozgrywający się na niestabilnych ekologicznie i politycznie terenach południowej Arizony.

programme.title: Osiem
programme.desc: Kobieta cierpiąca na zaburzenie obsesyjno-kompulsywne (OCD) zmaga się z poranną rutyną, jaką jest próba dotarcia na czas do pracy.

programme.title: Wzbogać się za Darmo
programme.desc: Trzech młodych akwizytorów z Los Angeles wpada w kłopoty finansowe i postanawiają, że znalezienie skarbu jest najlepszym sposobem na ich rozwiązanie.

programme.title: Ostatni Płatny Zabójca
programme.desc: Starzejący się płatny zabójca, Harry, właśnie spartaczył robotę i jest teraz celem. Jego córka również zajmuje się zawodowo zabójstwem i teraz również jest celem.

programme.title: Niesprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Tajemnicza postać przetrzymuje zakładników, aby wymusić zmiany. Dee postanawia, że jedynym sposobem, aby skłonić rząd do wysłuchania jej potrzeb, jest przetrzymywanie ludzi jako zakładników. Grozi im pozbawieniem życia wbrew prostym zasadom, które jej zdaniem powinny się zmienić. W miarę gdy jej działania wymykają się spod kontroli, Dee stara się zachować spokój, gdy wszystko zamienia się w chaos.

programme.title: Pamiętniki Szekspira
programme.desc: Odkryto dawno zaginione dzienniki wielkiego Barda. Współczesna wersja.

programme.title: Evol - Teoria Miłości
programme.desc: 17-letni chłopak z problemami zostaje zmuszony do przeprowadzki do Nowego Jorku na terapię. Przez całe lato pozna nie tylko brutalność życia, ale także realia miłości.

programme.title: Brutalna Rzeczywistość
programme.desc: Wyszkolony przez FBI neuropsycholog łączy siły ze złodziejką, by znaleźć urządzenie zmieniające rzeczywistość, podczas gdy jej szalony były szef próbuje ich schwytać.

programme.title: Dawn
programme.desc: Kobieta ucieka przed straszną prawdą i razem ze swoją córeczką ukrywa się w odległym miasteczku na wzgórzach. W końcu przychodzi moment gdy przeszłość ją dogania. Kobieta staje przed niemożliwym wyborem.

programme.title: Nic mi nie jest
programme.desc: Jest to historia młodej dziewczyny, która musi pomóc swojej mamie Denise rozwieść się z byłym mężem Barrym, aby mogła poślubić swojego nowego ukochanego Jeffereya. Podczas weekendu z rodzicami na letnim obozie, Sam musi nakłonić ojca do podpisania dokumentów rozwodowych i nieświadomie zabiera ją na wycieczkę na konkurs muzyczny. Wszyscy myślą, że została porwana i jest wspólniczką napadu, więc mama i Law ruszają w pościg. Dramat prowadzi do tego, że rodzina staje się sobie bliższa niż kiedykolwiek wcześniej.

programme.title: Panorama Vegas
programme.desc: W obliczu wyginięcia swojego gatunku, zmieniające kształt, złe potwory z kosmosu zstępują na ziemię z zamiarem mutacji z ludźmi.

programme.title: Teksańska bawełna
programme.desc: Doświadczony stróż prawa wierzy, że aresztowany nieznajomy jest niewinny. Gdy zaczyna drążyć sprawę, odkrywa tajemnice, które na zawsze zmienią jego miasteczko.

programme.title: Królestwo Piachu
programme.desc: Królestwo Piachu. W piwnicy, gdzieś w rozdartym wojną Bagdadzie, zakładnik Adam Smith czeka na śmierć.
Programista komputerowy staje się coraz bardziej rozczarowany podczas pracy nad projektem mającym na celu replikację ludzkiej inteligencji przy użyciu mapy ludzkiego genomu.

programme.title: Wiosna w Górach Skalistych
programme.desc: Po rozstaniu z powodu flirtów Dana, Vicky wraca do byłego partnera Victora, a kariera Dana upada. By ją odzyskać, rusza do Canadian Rockies, gdzie Vicky planuje nowe show. Sprawy się komplikują, gdy Dan przypadkowo zatrudnia ekscentryczną sekretarkę, co budzi u Vicky dawne podejrzenia.

programme.title: Kobieta, Która Śpiewa Do Gwiazd
programme.desc: Bezkresna pustynia. Rdzennie amerykańska babcia żyje samotnie uprawiając kukurydzę. Jej półmeksykański wnuk i biały, starzejący się magik zostają pozostawieni sami sobie.

programme.title: Ben i Ara
programme.desc: Religijne i kulturowe napięcia eskalują, kiedy muzułmanka z Afryki wdaje się w romans z agnostykiem.

programme.title: Falsyfikat
programme.desc: Daniel Jakor jest jednym z najbardziej płodnych i odnoszących sukcesy artystów, o jakich świat nigdy nie słyszał. Walcząc o sprzedaż własnej sztuki, wkrótce odkrywa, że jego prawdziwy geniusz nie polega na tworzeniu własnych dzieł, ale na fałszowaniu wielkich mistrzów, którzy przyszli przed nim.

programme.title: Nieubłagana Sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Była agentka australijskiego wywiadu Victoria De Vries, wiedzie spokojne życie na przedmieściach Ameryki, gdzie jako samotna matka wychowuje jedyną córkę i prowadzi zajęcia we własnej szkole M.M.A. Kiedy jej córka wyjeżdża na kemping i nie wraca, Victoria jest zmuszona wrócić do akcji.

programme.title: Psychole
programme.desc: Trzy młode kobiety szukają zemsty na sadystycznym drapieżniku.

programme.title: Drugoklasista
programme.desc: Grupa licealistów przeżywa wiele przygód w ciągu swojego dziesiątego roku nauki.

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol' Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TV's future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppy's adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywood's greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
